meanings.definition: The left-hand page of an open book.
meanings.sent1: I turned the page to the verso to continue reading.
meanings.sent2: She found a note scribbled on the verso of the book.
meanings.sent3: The verso of the book had a surprise doodle by the author.
meanings.sent4: The verso of the book revealed a hidden message.
meanings.sent5: The verso of the book was filled with colorful illustrations.

meanings.definition: The back of a coin or postage stamp.
meanings.sent1: The collector carefully examined the verso of the rare coin.
meanings.sent2: The verso of the stamp had a beautiful design.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally smudged the ink on the verso of the stamp.
meanings.sent4: The verso of the coin gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The verso of the stamp showed a detailed image of a bird.

meanings.definition: The reverse side of a painting or drawing.
meanings.sent1: The artist signed their name on the verso of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The verso of the drawing had a faint pencil sketch.
meanings.sent3: A tiny smudge on the verso of the painting looked like a bug.
meanings.sent4: The verso of the artwork displayed intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The verso of the drawing was as beautiful as the front.
